data.text: @ninaturner A revolutionary pick would be if @tamronhall or @AnnCurry returned. @TODAYshow execs have chosen a co-host whom Guthries is comfortable with.  Lauer dictated Curry's ouster due to discomfort.  Disturbing 'comfort' was Lauer's undoing, and Guthries was part of that culture. #nbc
